item.description:
We're joining the Boston Skeptics crowd to hear their guest speaker, Tim Farley.

Farley runs the web site "What's The Harm?" at http://whatstheharm.n..., where he details the injustices caused by belief in superstition and pseudoscience.

About Boston Skeptics:
Boston Skeptics is a group of critical thinkers who get together to talk, eat, drink, and be skeptical about things like homeopathy, creationism, psychics, aliens, alternative medicine, conspiracy theories, and whatever else catches our attention.

For more information, please visit http://bostonskeptics... or the event listing on Facebook, http://www.facebook.c....
item.name: Skeptics in the Pub
